p: These populations were expressed in terms of the number of H 2O bound per unit cell (UC). We note that a single UC consists of two MnO 2 units. Additionally, the conversion of the experimentally obtained “mass of bound H 2O per mass of MnO 2” to “H 2O/UC” is made using the molar masses ( m MnO 2 ) of MnO 2 (0.20 K) for AcidBir and of MnO 2 (0.17 K) for δ-MnO 2.
